text:
Zenput | Senior Backend Engineers & Director of Engineering | SAN FRANCISCO, ATLANTA, or REMOTE | FULL-TIME

https://jobs.lever.co/zenput

Zenput is a mobile enterprise company that helps the likes of Domino's, 7-Eleven, Chipotle, etc manage their people and store operations. We operate across 35 countries and get to work with fun customers solving great problems!

We are a collective team of 25 with an HQ in San Francisco, a growing office in Atlanta and a few remote team members.

Our software stack leans heavily on JSON, HTML5 and Javascript. We extensively use Backbone in the frontend, connected to a Python/Django backend, with MySQL and Mongo for persistence. Our iOS and Android apps are also fully written with HTML and Javascript to round out our end-to-end JSON based stack.

I'm one of the two founders and CEO. Feel free to reach out to me directly at vladik@zenput.com if you have any questions.
